reviews.review_msg: His lectures are a bit abstract heavy sometimes, but overall interesting enough to listen to and explains things well. He is slow with uploading documents and lectures online and marking. He lets the TA take care of the labs entirely. The TA Roya was very difficult to understand and did not explain assignments or projects well.

While Nick seems like a nice guy, he is a terrible prof. He is disorganized and nothing was posted on WebCT on time(and don't ever call him Nick, Dr. Hedley only). Lecture notes are HUGE-$$ to print off. Spend 10+ hours/week in the SISlab doing work. The exams are all memorization and The TA's are basically useless-Lab time can be interesting tho.
